title.en: Tachibana-kun Daite Kudasai! Hajimete no Aite wa Douryou Ouji?!

altTitles.ja: 橘くん 抱いてください！ ハジメテの相手は同僚王子！？

altTitles.vi: Ôm Em Đi Tachibana-Kun! Người Tình Đầu Tiên Của Tôi Lại Là Tên Đồng Nghiệp Đẹp Mã Đó Ư?

altTitles.ko: 타치바나 군, 안아 주세요! 첫 상대는 훈남 동료?!

description.en:
"I... want you to... have se-sex with me...!"

The office lady (OL) Sumire is bad at dealing with men because she was raised surrounded mostly by women. Her experience of not having a boyfriend is equal to her age! If that same Sumire wants to experience men once... then it has to be sex! Sumire has set the hurdle high for someone who has trouble handling men. When she asks Tachibana, who is the only man she can speak to normally, he says he'll have sex with her with some conditions?

A sweet story of a [Popular and hot colleague] x [Beautiful but unpopular virgin OL] pair that will keep your heart throbbing.This is a "How to have sex" romance!
description.es: “Yo... quiero... tener sex-sexo contigo..." La oficinista Sumire es mala para tratar con los hombres porque ha crecido rodeada principalmente de mujeres. ¡Su experiencia de no tener novio es igual a su edad! Si esa misma Sumire quiere experimentar con los hombres una vez... ¡Entonces tiene que ser con sexo! Sumire ha fijado un gran obstáculo para alguien que tiene problemas manejando a los hombres. Cuando le pregunta a Tachibana, que es el único hombre con el que puede hablar normalmente, ¿él le dice que tendrá sexo con ella con algunas condiciones...? Una dulce historia de una pareja [colega popular y sexy] x [oficinista hermosa pero una virgen poco popular] que hará palpitar su corazón... ¡Este es un romance de "Cómo tener sexo"!
description.zh: 在女性的环境中长大的中堂堇一直都不擅长和男性交流。不知何时，也给外人留下了「中堂堇对男人没有兴趣」的印象。但是哪怕只有一次也好，堇想要做一次爱。这时候的她撞上了自己同僚橘君。抱着豁出去的心情，堇向橘君发出求助。
